laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Illumigene DNA amplification assay for C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile (Reference Range-Negative)

Gallbladder moderately distended with significant mural edema, two large calcified gallstones, patchy hyperenhancement of gallbladder mucosa, trace free fluid in abdomen, findings concerning for contained rupture.
